problem.p: This is a concept question, provided to check your understanding of the previous video clip.
Check all the following which are true, regarding the properties of common norms.

choice.text: The dual of the [mathjaxinline]L_{\infty }[/mathjaxinline] norm is the [mathjaxinline]L_1[/mathjaxinline] norm.
The [mathjaxinline]L_1[/mathjaxinline] norm of a vector is the sum of the absolute values of the vector elements.
The [mathjaxinline]L_2[/mathjaxinline] norm of a vector is the sum of the squares of the absolute values of the vector elements
The [mathjaxinline]L_2[/mathjaxinline] norm of a vector is the square root of the sum of the squares of the absolute values of the vector elements.
The trace norm is a measure of distance between two vectors.
The trace norm is a measure of distance between two matrices.
